fullplot: A drama that chronicles the life of Winnie Mandela from her childhood through her marriage and her husband's incarceration.
plot: A drama that chronicles the life of Winnie Mandela from her childhood through her marriage and her husband's incarceration.
title: Winnie Mandela

tomatoes.consensus: Winnie Mandela takes few chances and delves only superficially into its subject's life, making it feel more like a too-earnest made-for-TV movie than a proper biopic.

writers: Annè Matiè Du Preez Bezdrob (inspired by and based upon the book "Winnie Mandela: A Life")
